sourcesContent:
import { React, forwardRef } from "react"; import NumberFormat from "react-number-format"; import { format } from "date-fns"; import n2words from 'n2words' import QRCode from "react-qr-code"; const PurchasePreviewContent = forwardRef((props, ref) => { let persianDigits = "۰۱۲۳۴۵۶۷۸۹"; let persianMap = persianDigits.split(""); function convertToPersianNumber(input) { return input.replace(/\d/g, function (m) { return persianMap[parseInt(m)]; }); } function getArabicDate(engishDate) { let event = new Date(engishDate); let options = { /*weekday: 'long', */ year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric', hour: "numeric", minute: "numeric", second: "numeric", }; return event.toLocaleDateString('ar-EG', options) } return (<> {props.model.pages && props.model.pages.map((page, pageIndex) => (

  • {props.model.store ? props.model.store.name : ""}

  • {props.model.store ? props.model.store.title : ""}
    • {/* */}
  • C.R. / {props.model.store ? props.model.store.registration_number : ""}
  • VAT / {props.model.store ? props.model.store.vat_no : ""}
{props.model.store && props.model.store.logo ? : null}

  • {props.model.store ? props.model.store.name_in_arabic : ""}

  • {props.model.store ? props.model.store.title_in_arabic : ""}
    • {/* */}
  • {props.model.store ? props.model.store.registration_number_in_arabic : ""} / رقم التسجيل
  • {props.model.store ? props.model.store.vat_no_in_arabic : ""} / الرقم الضريبي

PURCHASE TAX INVOICE / فاتورة ضريبية

  • Invoice No.: {props.model.code ? props.model.code : ""}
  • Invoice Date: {props.model.date ? format( new Date(props.model.date), "MMM dd yyyy h:mma" ) : ""}
  • Vendor: {props.model.vendor ? props.model.vendor.name : ""}
  • VAT Number: {props.model.vendor ? props.model.vendor.vat_no : ""}
{props.model.QRImageData ? : ""}
  • {props.model.code ? props.model.code : ""} :رقم فاتورة الشراء
  • تاريخ فاتورة الشراء: {props.model.date ? getArabicDate(props.model.date) : ""}
  • :اسم البائع{props.model.vendor ? props.model.vendor.name_in_arabic : ""}
  • :ظريبه الشراء{props.model.vendor ? props.model.vendor.vat_no_in_arabic : ""}
{props.model.total_pages ? "Page " + (pageIndex + 1) + " of " + props.model.total_pages : ""}
{props.model.total_pages ? convertToPersianNumber(props.model.total_pages.toString()) + " الصفحة " + convertToPersianNumber((pageIndex + 1).toString()) + " من " : ""}
{page.products && page.products.map((product, index) => ( ))}
  • رقم سري
  • SI No.
  • رمز الصنف
  • Part No.
  • وصف
  • Description
  • كمية
  • Qty
  • سعر الوحدة
  • Unit Price
  • سعر
  • Price
{index + 1 + (pageIndex * props.model.pageSize)} {product.part_number ? product.part_number : ""} {product.name}{product.name_in_arabic ? "/" + product.name_in_arabic : ""} {product.quantity ? product.quantity.toFixed(2) : ""} {product.unit ? product.unit : ""} {product.purchase_unit_price ? value} /> : ""} value} />
Total المجموع: value} />
Shipping / Handling Fees رسوم الشحن / المناولة: value} />
Discount خصم: value} />
VAT ضريبة: {props.model.vat_percent.toFixed(2)}% value} />
Net Total الإجمالي الصافي: value} />
In Words بكلمات:
  • {n2words(props.model.net_total, { lang: 'ar' }) + " ريال سعودي "}
  • {n2words(props.model.net_total, { lang: 'en' }) + " saudi riyals"}
Delivered By سلمت بواسطة: {props.model.order_placed_by_user ? props.model.order_placed_by_user.name : null} Received By استلمت من قبل:
Signature إمضاء: {props.model.delivered_by_signature ? : null} Signature إمضاء:
Date تاريخ: {props.model.signature_date_str ? props.model.signature_date_str : ""} {props.model.signature_date_str ? getArabicDate(props.model.signature_date_str) : ""} Date تاريخ:
{/*props.model.QRImageData && */}
  • {props.model.store ? props.model.store.address_in_arabic : ""}
